summary: The diff shows backend changes removing subscription logic and preserving messaging functionality, but lacks evidence of frontend UI changes required by REQ-13. The backend appears to implement unrestricted messaging features (REQ-14, REQ-15), though complete verification is limited by truncated project_state.json.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove any subscription, payment, or premium tier UI elements from all frontend components
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend component modifications are shown in the diff. Only backend (main.mo) and project_state.json were modified. There is no evidence that subscription/payment UI elements were removed from React components.
